mapper.insert: INSERT INTO warship_type (warship_type_id, warship_type_name, armor, hp, mobility, concealment, action_priority, weapon_types) VALUES (#{warshipTypeId}, #{warshipTypeName}, #{armor}, #{hp}, #{mobility}, #{concealment}, #{actionPriority}, #{weaponTypes})
mapper.select: SELECT id, warship_type_id, warship_type_name, armor, hp, mobility, concealment, action_priority, weapon_types FROM warship_type ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE warship_type SET warship_type_id = #{warshipTypeId}, warship_type_name = #{warshipTypeName}, armor = #{armor}, hp = #{hp}, mobility = #{mobility}, concealment = #{concealment}, action_priority = #{actionPriority}, weapon_types = #{weaponTypes} WHERE id = #{id}
